152.content:
Your name is ________. You waked up shrunken at 1 inch. You don't remember what happened before or how you got here. You felt something heavy on your back. You felt something cold and metal. You were able to release the grips of the weird device as it landed behind you. You observed the device, It looks like a pair of wing that resembled Meta Ridley's wings from Metroid Prime. "Wait, am I in a video game?" You questioned yourself. You put the wings back and decided to test fly. You first took off at 2 feet at a good speed. You got hang of the controls like ascending, descending, accelerating and decelerating, movement and what not. Finally you landed back on the floor and began to look around.

It looks like someone's room, but who's room?
152.title: You

choices: They're having brunch with friends ( IF, Compra, and the other Goddess)
1521.content:
The room was a light purple. A pink bunk bed could be seen in the distance with a circle pattern of Purple, Blue, and Yellow. There was a small round table with two chairs that looked very comfortable on top of a dark purple rug. There were a few stuffed animals scattered around, but nothing too messy. This was the room of Planeptune's Goddess: Neptune and judging by bunk bed, this room belongs to Neptune's sister: Nepgear.

Speaking of those two, where are they?
1521.title: Nep Nep Nep!

15212.content:
You suddenly heard muffled chatter from the door behind you. The floor began to shake more violently with each second. Suddenly, the door opened revealing Neptune, Nepgear, Noire, Blanc, Vert, IF, Compra, and Plutia. You noticed they were coming towards you, so you activated the wings and moved out of the way of one of the girls's feet and landed near a shelf.

"I believe everyone's here, so LET'S START EATING!" Neptune said excitedly with a hungry look in her eyes.

"How!?" Noire interrupted, "Your table is too small. We should've took this brunch meet at my Basilicom."

"Not to worry my friendless friend!" Neptune answered, but Noire looked like she was going to kill her for that comment. "With this switch that is now here for some reason and is probably some kind of plot device, we can have brunch in this room!"

"Neptune, it's too early to do that crap now. If you don't stop now, I'LL BREAK YOUR FUCKING LEGS!" Blanc yelled. You couldn't see Blanc's eyes, except for one ominous, glowing, red light that sent a shiver down you spine.

Neptune flipped the switch without hesitation, causing a trap door to open below the table, lowering it out of sight. Then, one of the walls opened up and dragged the bunk bed away. At this point, you were surprised, but at the same time, confused.

"Plot device? What does she mean by that?" You wondered. Finally, the floor opened up again, raising up a big dining table with food, drinks, and utensils all set up. Everyone was impressed by the whole transformation.

"Did you set this up yourself Neptune? In fact, are you really the same Neptune?" IF asked.

"No silly! Like I said, I don't know where it came from or who made it." Neptune answered. She made a face which looked like she really didn't care about the mysterious mechanism

"Well, who ever made it, must have really cared about you." Compra proclaimed.

With that out of the way, every one sat down and began eating. The question was now, which side of the table do you fly towards?

Option 1: Left side (Neptune, Nepgear, Compra, and IF)

Option 2: Right side (Noire, Blanc, Vert, and Plutia)
15212.title: A Grand Feast
